 Read a specified number of bytes from a process.
static int ReadInt (Process process, long address)
 Read an integer from the process (actually a short because it is only 4 bytes).
static byte ReadByte (Process process, long address)
 Read a byte from memory.
static string ReadString (Process process, long address)
 Read a string from memmory. Splits at 00 and returns first section to avoid junk.
static bool WriteBytes (Process process, long address, byte[] bytes, uint length)
 Write a specified number of bytes to a process.
static bool WriteInt (Process process, long address, int value)
 Write an integer to memory.
static bool WriteByte (Process process, long address, byte value)
 Write a byte to memory.
static bool WriteString (Process process, long address, string str)
 Write a string to memory.
static bool WriteRSA (Process process, long address, string newKey)
 Set the RSA key. Different from WriteString because must overcome protection.
